data.name: Flutter Day India
data.description: Flutter Day India is an online event driven by Indian Flutter Communities to gather all Flutter passionates and learn to create beautiful apps! Our goal is to share Flutter knowledge, improve Flutter skills, and expand the Flutter community. Flutter Day India will take place on June 27, 2020.

relatedRecords.name: Mobile ML DevFest
relatedRecords.description: Mobile & ML DevFest is our annual event showcasing the incredible developer talent located here in Salt Lake. The community wants AI/ML, Mobile, IoT topics, so this is where to come in order to learn. We’ll have speakers and workshops from a variety of speakers covering various tech topics. More inf…

relatedRecords.name: CodeMobile
relatedRecords.description: CodeMobile is a UK developer conference that has been created by developers who love creating apps in the mobile space. It’s an opportunity to network, share ideas and collaborate. The conference has two tracks, one focussed on iOS development, the other on Android.
